languages.text: "Из тебя могла бы получиться пристойная друкари, кузина. Если бы ты нашла в себе силы признать, что твой Путь — заблуждение, и принять нашу стезю".
"You might make a decent Drukhari, cousin, if you could find the strength to admit that your Path is a delusion and follow in our footsteps."
languages.original_text: "Из тебя могла бы получиться пристойная друкари, кузина. Если бы ты нашла в себе силы признать, что твой Путь — заблуждение, и принять нашу стезю".

traits.locale_text: "You might make a decent Drukhari, cousin, if you could find the strength to admit that your Path is a delusion and follow in our footsteps."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “只要你肯承认自己走错了路，重新跟上我们的脚步，你就会成为一位体面的黑暗灵族，表妹。”
languages.original_text: "You might make a decent Drukhari, cousin, if you could find the strength to admit that your Path is a delusion and follow in our footsteps."

traits.locale_text: “只要你肯承认自己走错了路，重新跟上我们的脚步，你就会成为一位体面的黑暗灵族，表妹。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Vous pourriez faire une Drukhari digne de ce nom, cousine, si vous suiviez nos traces plutôt que de vous obstiner à suivre cette Voie chimérique. »
languages.original_text: "You might make a decent Drukhari, cousin, if you could find the strength to admit that your Path is a delusion and follow in our footsteps."

traits.locale_text: « Vous pourriez faire une Drukhari digne de ce nom, cousine, si vous suiviez nos traces plutôt que de vous obstiner à suivre cette Voie chimérique. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr könntet einen ordentlichen Drukhari abgeben, Base. Ihr müsstet nur die Kraft aufbringen, einzugestehen, dass Euer Pfad eine Täuschung ist ... und stattdessen in unsere Fußstapfen treten."
languages.original_text: "You might make a decent Drukhari, cousin, if you could find the strength to admit that your Path is a delusion and follow in our footsteps."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr könntet einen ordentlichen Drukhari abgeben, Base. Ihr müsstet nur die Kraft aufbringen, einzugestehen, dass Euer Pfad eine Täuschung ist ... und stattdessen in unsere Fußstapfen treten."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「自分の道が妄想であることを認め、我々の足跡をたどる強さを見出すことができれば、お前はまともなデュカーリになれるかもしれない」
languages.original_text: "You might make a decent Drukhari, cousin, if you could find the strength to admit that your Path is a delusion and follow in our footsteps."

traits.locale_text: 「自分の道が妄想であることを認め、我々の足跡をたどる強さを見出すことができれば、お前はまともなデュカーリになれるかもしれない」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Prima, serías una Drukhari decente si tuvieras el valor de admitir que tu Senda es un delirio y siguieras nuestros pasos».
languages.original_text: "You might make a decent Drukhari, cousin, if you could find the strength to admit that your Path is a delusion and follow in our footsteps."

traits.locale_text: «Prima, serías una Drukhari decente si tuvieras el valor de admitir que tu Senda es un delirio y siguieras nuestros pasos».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "You might make a decent Drukhari, cousin, if you could find the strength to admit that your Path is a delusion and follow in our footsteps."

languages.text: "Aslında Yolunun dalalet olduğunu kabul edecek gücü bulup izimizden gelsen senden iyi Drukhari olurdu kuzen."
languages.original_text: "You might make a decent Drukhari, cousin, if you could find the strength to admit that your Path is a delusion and follow in our footsteps."

traits.locale_text: "Aslında Yol'unun dalalet olduğunu kabul edecek gücü bulup izimizden gelsen senden iyi Drukhari olurdu kuzen."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
